attributes.action: To build a proper pullup and dip bars in every city parks for heathy active life
attributes.additional_details: Beneficial for everyone. To have more people interested in sports rather then unhealthy way of living. Especialy kids like to mimic and there is a whole niche in that kind of activity where kids would be more likely to be motivated in staying away from criminal activities and have that heathy way of living example that anyone can do it. There is already gymnastics sets build in some cities and it works so why not get them done in every city.
attributes.background: There is no where to see a proper active sets in parks. The ones that are in the park are a joke that meant to make a park look fun and most of them damaged beyond repair. Should be a proper set in parks for people that loves active life. Teenagers to have access to be athletic way of living.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
